title-group.article-title: Remembering Childhood: Critical Memory Through Text and Image in Miguel Gutiérrez's "La destrucción del reino"

abstract.p: This essay analyzes the relationship between text and image in La destructión delreino by Miguel Gutiérrez, with photographs by Julio Olavarria. The essay argues that the authors perform a critical type of memory work that allows their art, here photography and narration, to become a method for mourning and moving beyond the impasse produced by the guilt and the sense of loss experienced by the social subject in times of trauma.
